name: Toki Time Trial
description: What could you accomplish if you had the ability to stop time? Become a master of time and space as you take on temporal puzzles in this first person puzzle platformer.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7+ Processor: Intel Pentium 4 / AMD Athlon XP 1.5 Ghz or higher Memory: 1 GB RAM MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 10 compatible, 128MB VRAM DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 30 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7+ Processor: Intel Pentium 4 / AMD Athlon XP 1.5 Ghz or higher Memory: 1 GB RAM MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 10 compatible, 128MB VRAM DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 30 MB available space
